actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: Joint resolution relating to the withdrawal of all minerals in certain areas of the Los Padres National Forest, Calif., from all forms of appropriation under the mining law and from disposition under all laws pertaining to mineral leasing.

summary.text: Withdraws all minerals within a specified area of the Los Padres National Forest in California from all forms of appropriation or disposition under mining and mineral leasing laws.

titles.title: Joint resolution relating to the withdrawal of all minerals in certain areas of the Los Padres National Forest, Calif., from all forms of appropriation under the mining law and from disposition under all laws pertaining to mineral leasing.
